alert.note: Alert for Ashland; Iron (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued April 28 at 2:46PM CDT until May 01 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Duluth MN has issued a Flood Watch for the following rivers in Wisconsin... Tyler Forks near Mellen affecting Ashland and Iron Counties. ...FLOOD WATCH FOR THE TYLER FORKS RIVER IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY AFTERNOON TO EARLY MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding is possible on the Tyler Forks River. * WHERE...Tyler Forks River near Mellen. * WHEN...From Saturday afternoon to early Monday morning. * IMPACTS...At 9.8 feet, At this level State Highway 169 is likely impacted by flood water. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:30 PM CDT Friday the stage was 7.0 feet. - Forecast...Flood stage on the Tyler Forks River near Mellen may be reached Saturday afternoon and could then remain in flood stage into Sunday. - Flood stage is 9.0 feet. - Flood safety information can be found at www.weather.gov/safety/flood. && Fld Observed Forecasts Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sat Sun Mon Tyler Forks Mellen 9.0 7.0 Fri 2 pm CDT 9.0 9.2 7.9 &&
info.instruction: If you are in the watch area, remain alert to possible flooding. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/duluth. The next statement will be issued Saturday morning by 1100 AM CDT.
